ingredients: 3 links of mild Italian sausage, casings removed
¼ teaspoon of freshly grated black pepper
¼ teaspoon of crushed red pepper flakes (optional)
2 cups of low sodium chicken stock
¼ cup of diced sundried tomatoes
⅓ cup of grated Parmesan cheese, divided
2½ cups of San Giorgio® Mafalda pasta
1 tablespoon of flat leaf Italian parsley, minced
3 ounces of Fontina cheese, cubed and a little extra grated for garnish
